thread.title: Tech transforms children's books to a virtual world

title: Tech transforms children's books to a virtual world
text:
Tech transforms children's books to a virtual world 8:53pm GMT - 01:24 
Researchers at the UK's Lancaster University have begun a pioneering project to bring classic children's books to life by creating 3D visualizations of texts on gaming platforms. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Researchers at the UK's Lancaster University have begun a pioneering project to bring classic children's books to life by creating 3D visualizations of texts on gaming platforms. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2GQsCWb
